mapper.sql: id, name, tel, pwd, email, createtime, lasttime, login_num, state, login_type, picurl,sex,birthday,integral,wx_ident
mapper.insert: insert into raste_user (id, name, tel, pwd, email, createtime, lasttime, login_num, state, login_type, picurl,sex,birthday,integral,wx_ident) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lasttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{login_num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{login_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sex},#{birthday},#{integral},#{wx_ident})

update raste_user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select:
select
from raste_user t where t.state != 2
and tel like CONCAT('%', #{jname}, '%')
order by t.createtime desc
limit #{num1},#{num2}

select count(0) from raste_user t where t.state != 2
and tel like CONCAT('%', #{jname}, '%')
mapper.update:
update raste_user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
